passages.title: Romans 8:18–30 — Sanctification Through Groaning, Help, and Conformity
passages.summary_md: Romans 8:18–30 frames sanctification as Spirit-governed transformation toward Christ's image. Creation groans, believers groan, and the Spirit intercedes within weakness according to God's will—ensuring that suffering, prayer, hope, and providence converge toward conformity to the Son and final glory.
